Name: Kaushik G
Title: Green lung of the city
Review: During our vacation  in the city of Hyderabad we had visited this big beautiful park which is full of greenery and a great place to walk around. The park is located at one end of Hussain Sagar Lake. Entrance tickets are cheap at 20 rupees per person. One  of the popular attractions inside the Park is the rose garden with variety of roses in all colors. We also saw the Sanjeevaiah memorial, Butterfly garden, national flag and got a absolutely  amazing view of the Hussain Sagar Lake.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Second visit
Review: Our second visit today after it became children's park. Some of the areas like memorial, cactus garden, butterfly park and rose garden to some extent are well maintained. One thing that is missing is restaurant. There is small shop which sells cool drinks, chips, ice cream etc.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Must visit
Review: The park has a Butterfly garden, Rock garden. Bamboo garden, Rose garden, besides memorial to Damodarm Sanjeevaiah. One of the tallest Indian flags is also installed here. So there is much to see and enjoy in this park

Name: jainms
Title: Very large
Review: Its spacious park& can see lot of outdoor activities inside park. Located near Hussain sage  tank bund road.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Good place for joggers
Review: This park is situated on the main road from masabtank to banjarahills and it is neatly maintained. We went for evening walk and it was a nice experience although there are not much playing options for kids.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Visited in childhood
Review: this place has got good games and also is well organised and located near to the Imax cinemas which is in centre of city

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice
Review: Easily accessible via the local train called MMTS and quite famous and people come here to relax in the evening and walk in the morning

Name: Daniel T
Title: Neatly maintained park for public
Review: I still remember my childhood memories when we went here for school picnic. Its still a noted public park and well maintained one.The area outside the park is isolated after sunset, so be very careful not to be alone here.It also has the famous Indian Flag hoisted inside.

Name: deepa v
Title: Maintained well
Review: It's one of the oldest park in hyderabad.It has lot of greenery.Famous for young couples..Can spend few hours...

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Best parks in the city
Review: The park is quite good, pretty neat and less noise compared to other parks in the city, due to less traffic in the roads

Name: idea614354
Title: PArk for children
Review: Sanjeevaiah park is a famous and oldest park in hyderabad. childrens will enjoy this place to play..

Name: koteswararao
Title: parkin tank bund
Review: good park  with all people can go free parties can be conducted meeting are conducted  long run in side

Name: sandeep g
Title: nice
Review: good place to visit to have peace of mind , good time to visit is late in the nite when the city is sleepy

Name: Praveen K
Title: Greenery and a nice place on the banks of tankbund
Review: a green and clean place on the banks of tankbund. this park is famous for young couples. well maintained park to spend relaxed evenings in hyderbad

Name: Rao1940497
Title: A park worth wondering.
Review: This park is worth wondering, one can spend an hour or two. Good place to relax, rest and even to sleep quitely.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Lots of greenery!
Review: It is a good place to spend a day on weekends. Children will really enjoying. You can carry bat and ball, frisbies etc.

Name: Veeresh k
Title: Great time..
Review: It was very spacious Nd so good looking.. look superb by lakeside.. can have fun with friends Nd family members...

Name: santosh2ind
Title: sanjeevaiah park
Review: This is a very beautiful park in hyderabad. recently in this park one flog was made this flog is the very big in size. every one should see this flog.

Name: renu_73
Title: well maintained and spacious park
Review: Excellent place for the children to run around and play extremely well maintained and spacious.They have canteens inside where you can buy bottled water and snacks.You have security guards keeping a watchful eye on everyone. They allow cricket bats and balls and a lot of people come there with families to spend the day and bring their picnic mats and baskets.

Name: Kirantp
Title: Good for a long stroll
Review: Poorly managed,is the first impression you get from the Car park and the park entrance.The park is huge and good for a relaxed long walk.The tallest national flag is a must see for all.The walkway is not that great towards the end.Would suggest not to explore secluded areas after 6pm as it really gets scary after evening.Rose garden is worth a watch.Good landscaping ,lot of places to capture some good family snaps.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of saneevaiah park
Review: Very big park near by sagar lake, but here there is no item to play with kids. All the items are damaged.

Name: Lav Dwivedi
Title: Good park on lakeside
Review: Sanjeevaiah Park is easily accessible via MMTS and is a good park to visit in the evening. Good to sit and talk with friends. Snack items can be seen on sale by local vendors. Good for an evening visit

Name: NITESH P
Title: Best Park of necklace road
Review: Less hyped but good large green Park on necklace road. The park is clean and huge with awesome greenery. Fountains makes the evening pleasant. Rose Garden is good but lacks the attraction. Good for morning and evening walk.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Park on Lake side
Review: Sanjeevaiah park in Hyderbad on Neklace road is located on hussian sagar lake side with nice view of Sagar lake with rare collection of Birds.Rose Gardens inside the Saneevaiah park is the special attraction over there.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: nice place for a run
Review: The place has tracks for runners and also benches for people to sit down and also nice garden areas. But the main attraction is the Indian flag hoisted at one end of the park.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: A must visit for nature lovers
Review: A city which is filled with vehicles this is the place to be visited once a while to sit in nature's lap and enjoy its beauty.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Big Green Park
Review: Its a big green park near Begum pet in Secunderabad. You can visit here by bus or even by train. The park is huge and is very well maintained.

Name: MoneyBhai
Title: Kissing Park
Review: This is a park famous or "in"famous for couples looking for privacy at no cost in city. Any day - any time is full of couples looking for private public place

Name: superb114
Title: Place to Refresh
Review: Sanjeevaiah park in the Necklace road is a nice place to hang on along with the friends you can feel relaxed if you have a morning or evening walk along with your friends

Name: Sachin D
Title: A morning walk catching the Sunrise:)
Review: This park is a nice spot to find morning walkers,yogis,sports enthusiasts etc.It has this nice location where sunrise can beautifully be seen.It's very spacious with lots of greenery flaura and fauna and 100+ varieties of trees.The place has nice facilities like canteen,washroom and plenty of trees to relax under.*cycling inside the park is allowed which is a very nice thing as one can get the view of the whole park in shorter span of time.Entry for morning Walker's is 5 and evening visitors is 10bucks.Final verdict:No complaints. A good place to start your mornings;)

Name: Harshith358
Title: Park on the Necklace Road
Review: The is the one and only park located on the necklace road. Its good place to spend time alone as well as when your are in company.

Name: THEROAMINGSAM
Title: A Time to relax
Review: Went with family for a picnic to theis garden. The Park is situated on the Hussain Sagar lake. Pleanty of trees and lush green grass to lie down and enjoy. There are some games for tiny tots, nothing for grown ups. A nice rose garden has been developed by the Municipal Authorities.  It is frequented by young lovers who hide among the bushes in the park. Familis come for picnic to this place. A nice place to spend in the evenings. Restaurants are very costly.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Park with Landscapes
Review: Sanjeevaiah Park spread over a huge area of about 920 acres is situated in the heart of the city towards Secunderabad. This park is named after Sri Damodaram Sanjeevaiah, former Chief Minister of Andhra PradeshThe park, along the banks of Hussain Sagar Lake is managed hy HMDA.The Park holds best open landscapes and is a feast to the eyes to see and enjoy the park.Large number of visitors throng the part on Holidays and week ends.The Rock Garden, Floral Clock and a variety of Roses are the main attractions at the Park. All ages people enjoy here. The cool breeze flowing from the Lake makes one's mind afresh and spend a few hours forgetting the outside world.

Name: Robin A
Title: Park is fine
Review: One can plan to spend some time here. Located in middle of city, nearby a local railway station also can help people travelling from far-off places.Its on bank of HUssain sagar, but this art has lost its glimpse, as it is not maintained and bad odour also spoils your mood.

Name: Kashyap Kocherlakota
Title: Usual Park alongside hussainsagar lake
Review: Used to visit this place a lot of times during childhood and after my recent visit, I found it to be a good place and with a lot of renovation. Nothing great though, its just a park with a huge place to walk around and relax.

Name: madabushi
Title: Excellent weekend spot  for family with large meadows and greenery to play around
Review: During one of the weekends we went round for a change and felt Sanjeevayya par kis ok to spend a little longer and to play with kids.We had been to this place many times in the past, we never felt bored here, hence a safe place to quickly get in as it is adjacent to tank bund in the necklace road.  It is hardly 7  kilometers from Bowenpally.It is a large green grass mat with slight ups and downs like a mountainous region.  We played throw ball for sometime, then had some cool drink thereitself and thenwe had the running race for kids inside the park.   We rested and chatted for sometime and then walked around and all small standard park children play facilities like parallel bars, swings, merry go round, rocking systems  and so on.  spread over a large area. To get so much space inside the city is really great.   It is also not noisy at all.   If you want to spend leisure time with your family and discuss all concerns and get closer to every one of your family , it is a great place with lot of privacy and great lawns every where.

Name: Yash147
Title: Perfect Picnic
Review: It is one of the best places to go for a picnic within the city. Go there as a large group with friends/family, get Hyderabadi biryani takeaway to eat in the park, play flying discs/tennikoit, debate about current affairs, relax for the whole afternoon and go back home at sunset. It is wonderful that there is such a beautiful getaway without leaving the city.

Name: sugunapriya b
Title: Average park
Review: Just went for a visit on the go but couldnt find anything enjoyable. Went there with kids and they too got bored. Its much of a lovers park and u can see more of couples than families. better to go to lumbini or NTR park if with kids.

Name: sunnychandani
Title: walk to ur health
Review: very near to my home. i keep visiting. ticket only 5 rs. long walk way. big area. they are developing a beautiful rose garden inside the park, it is nearly developed but i think formal inauguration is pending. very good and scenic location just con is beside tank bund should be cleaned so it becomes stench free.

Name: nikrang
Title: Good potential lousy environment
Review: The lake is so polluted that it takes away the charm of this little park.Well maintained park area(could be much better though),reputation a bit dodgy ,because of large daytime population of young couples seeking privacy.If the lake were clean- that would be something then

Name: Sri Satya Sai S
Title: Huge Park in the center of the city
Review: Sanjeevaiah Park is located next to Hussain Sagar lake and on necklace road. Park is spread on huge area and it can accommodate thousands people at a time. There are nice rides for kids inside the park and plenty of green space for family gathering.

Name: Sanjeev_Sharma
Title: Okiee
Review: Not much to do here. ideal if you are looking for the kids to have some  play area (Picnic Spot) or if you like to go for walk then visit here

Name: raviarya
Title: superb
Review: really awesome place..one of the greatest place to visit...atleast i visited here for 10 to 15 times even though i did not felt bore..such a pleasant place for every one and really good, must visit and see.

Name: Prakash S
Title: Many attractions for children
Review: The park is more like an amusement centre. It is a great place for an outing with kids. There is lot of space to run around and play. The greenery is nice. Various games and rides also dot the park. Food outlets are plentiful. On the whole a nice day for a picnic or an outing with children.
